aln2dnastring

Source: R/aln2dnastring.R
aln2dnastring.Rd

This function converts a seqinr alignment into an DNAStringSet.

aln2dnastring(aln)

Arguments

aln

seqinr alignment [mandatory]

Value

An object of class DNAStringSet

See also

as.alignment DNAStringSet

Author

Kristian K Ullrich

Examples

## define two cds sequences
cds1 <- Biostrings::DNAString("ATGCAACATTGC")
cds2 <- Biostrings::DNAString("ATGCATTGC")
cds1.cds2.aln <- cds2codonaln(cds1, cds2)
## convert into alignment
dnastring2aln(cds1.cds2.aln)

#> $nb
#> [1] 2
#> 
#> $nam
#> [1] "cds1" "cds2"
#> 
#> $seq
#> [1] "atgcaacattgc" "atg---cattgc"
#> 
#> $com
#> [1] NA
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "alignment"
## convert into DNAStringSet
aln2dnastring(dnastring2aln(cds1.cds2.aln))

#> DNAStringSet object of length 2:
#>     width seq                                               names               
#> [1]    12 ATGCAACATTGC                                      cds1
#> [2]    12 ATG---CATTGC                                      cds2
